name: Akshar Agro Exports
description: Shares 90% of its production to exports
overview:
Akshar Agro

In the year 1986, a young entrepreneur set on a journey with a vision to cater the agricultural produce of his native village Junagadh in Gujarat to the peoples of the world. The journey began when Shambhubhai Zalawadia hailing from the farming community embarked on the journey armed with a graduate degree in agriculture. Over the years the company developed a very strong presence in the cotton market together with other agro products like Mangoes,Groundnuts and Dehydrated onions and garlic. The company started out with a single promise to be committed to its people and to its customers. Today, Akshar Agro Exports shares around 90% of its production to exports. The concern is one among the leading cotton bale exporters from India. The concern plays a major role in the exports of Mangoes,Groundnuts, Fresh and Dehydrated onions and garlic.

Vision: Explore new horizons and cater quality products globally.

Mission : Fulfil customer requirements timely, transparent, matchless service and relationship.

providerships.title: Groundnuts, Cotton bales, Mangoes, Onion & Garlic
